scenes.background: You decided to help with the urgent task. [Monica] and [Bob] join the conversation.
scenes.description: 'Thanks for stepping up. But, do you think it's worth sacrificing your leave for this?' She raises an eyebrow.

options.text: Maybe you're right. I'll back off and let you handle it.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation by considering stepping back, but empathy and emotional perception could be better.

options.text: It's fine, Monica. I want to make sure everything is perfect.
options.analysis: You display high empathy and emotional perception by staying involved, but it may impact your self-regulation.

options.text: I'll help for a bit longer, but let's make a plan first.
options.analysis: You balance your time off with work demands, showing good social skills, but emotional perception could be improved.
